scripts.build: npm run with-node-opts -- 'vue-cli-service build --target lib --name live-code ./src/index.js'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.with-node-opts: if npm run is-legacy; then echo; else export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider; fi; bash -c
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm version patch --message 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm version minor --message 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm test && npm version major --message 'v%s' && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
